name: Emptiness to the Core
description:
An unknown light grows in the universe day by day  

(of course it’s not the sun), it threatens to erase our planet… 

In addition to that, there’re disgusting monsters of unknown origin who attack cities all over the world! The world is in ruins because of them… Everyone is gone. 

But don’t worry about it!

Our protagonist has the brilliant idea of hiding herself for a week in an abandoned mansion, and come out 4 hours before the end of everything…

…………….

…. Oh no…this is not a good news… Oh! At least she only needs to find 4 magic stones in order to restore peace… Ouch!  

4 hours for 4 old pebbles, it’s gonna be over the limit. 

Perhaps YOU will know how to get out of this nightmare in time;

 to do so explore this little world on the brink of death to collect 4 magic stones and face creatures all more disturbing than each other! 

Only in less than 4 hours!

How to play (point and click):

  • Turn with: <- , ->, right click+move the mouse, a, d,q
  • Turn back quickly: s, x, down arrow
  • Options: esc, back space
  • Inventory: ctrl
  • Flashlight: shift, middle mouse button
  • Speed Time: t, tab
  • Slow Time: e
  • See AI vision: v

PS: If you die… There will be no second chance, UNDERSTOOD? On that good luck!

THE GAME IS NOT FINISH!

(SORRY FOR MY BAD ENGLISH)
